raw_text:
SERVICE AGREEMENT
This Service Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into on 1st April 2024
between ABC Technologies Pvt. Ltd., having its registered office at Bengaluru,
Karnataka (“Service Provider”) and XYZ Retail Solutions, having its principal
place of business at Mumbai, Maharashtra (“Client”).
1. Scope of Services
The Service Provider shall provide software development and maintenance
services as agreed in writing from time to time.
2. Payment Terms
The Client shall pay a monthly fee of INR 2,00,000 within 15 days of receipt
of invoice. Delay in payment shall attract a penalty of 2% per month.
3. Term and Termination
This Agreement shall be valid for a period of 2 years.
The Client may terminate this Agreement at any time without cause by
providing 15 days written notice.
The Service Provider shall not terminate the Agreement before completion
of the term.
4. Confidentiality
Both parties shall maintain confidentiality of all business and technical
information received during the term of this Agreement.
5. Intellectual Property
All intellectual property created during the course of this Agreement shall
belong exclusively to the Client.
6. Indemnity
The Service Provider agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Client from
any claims, losses, or damages arising out of breach of this Agreement.
7. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India.
The courts of Mumbai shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement on the
date first written above.
